verbose_text: The EUCOMM / KOMP-CSD collection is based primarily around the ' knockout-first ' (tm1a) allele which contains either an IRES : lacZ trapping cassette and a floxed promoter driven neo cassette (promoter driven) or an in-frame fusion of lacZ and neo with T2A peptide sequences included to allow expression of lacZ and neo as independent polypeptides (promoterless) inserted into an intron of the targeted gene.
